item.title: Trump administration to continue Biden's strict scrutiny of corporate mergers
Judge orders Mayor Eric Adams, DOJ lawyers to appear in court to explain case dismissal request
item.description: President Donald Trump says he did not asked the Department of Justice to seek a dismissal of criminal charges against New York City Mayor Eric Adams.

item.title: Europe clambers to form Ukraine plan as U.S. forges ahead with Russia on peace talks
item.description: Europe is vying for a say in fast-advancing Russia-Ukraine peace talks after the U.S. over the weekend exacerbated fears that Brussels would be absent...

item.title: Trump wants the Supreme Court to let the firing of whistleblower agency head proceed
item.description: The Trump administration wants the Supreme Court to permit the firing of the head of the federal agency dedicated to protecting whistleblowers.

item.title: Trump administration cuts reach FDA employees in food safety, medical devices and tobacco products
item.description: Recently hired employees at the Food and Drug Administration who review the safety of food ingredients, medical devices and other products were fired.
